name: Trapped (itch) (Red Syllable Games)
description:
Trapped in the Laboratory test of a maniacal overlord, where even death has forsaken you. Try and survive the tests who knows to what end, 

A puzzle game for up to two players to play together. Press Enter (Return) on the keyboard for Player 2 to join.

Controls:

Player 1

Left: Left Arrow

Right: Right Arrow

Up: Up Arrow

Down: Down Arrow

Action: Left Control

Player 2

Left: A

Right: D

Up: W

Down: S

Action: Right Control
